page.title: 04Newbattle Abbey College
page.content:
Newbattle Abbey is a College of Education for adults who have no formal educational qualifications and are over the age of 20. Students stay at the Abbey for 2 years and study for a diploma in such subjects as History, Economics and English Literature. The Abbey has 85 students, of whom 65 are in residence and 6 teachers. The students come from all over Britain and also from abroad.
The College is situated on the site of an old Cistercian Abbey on the lands of Lord Lothian but is run by the Government which in the main is responsible for the allocation of grants to students from Britain.
